medium: Cotton velvet, silk, cotton, metal sequins, gold colored metallic thread
title: Jacket
description: pounded indigo lining; black velvet jacket; front panels longer; side vents; pounded indigo cuffed sleeves; shoulder and yolk heavily embroidered with bird and dragons; multi-colored with red predominating; edged with gold and red narrow tape bordered by embroidered bands; neck edge has blue satin insert bordered by embroidered tape which encloses an intricate rectangular design applique on PL center; similar rectangular design at back of neck; three embroidered figures on blue satin insert; two woven front ties
